value.stringValue: This is the first reminder: A SIP ticket has been submitted 5 days ago, and it still needs your approval. Please take an action on the ticket so SIP team can start working on the resolution
This is the second reminder: A SIP ticket has been submitted 8 days ago, and it still needs your approval. Please take an action on the ticket so SIP team can start working on the resolution

Third reminder: A SIP ticket has been submitted 20 days ago, continues waiting for approval from you. Please note that if SIP ticket do not have any action on the next 3 Days, it will be closed without completing requests.
1st reminder sent via email, ticket is waiting for your approval
2nd reminder sent via email, ticket continues waiting for your approval, please take action
3rd Reminder sent via email. Remember to take action on the ticket otherwise ticket will be closed on the next 3 days
Closing ticket as 3 reminders have been sent with no action on your side
